description: Dock 88 is the shipyard area within the G-8 Marine fortress where the Going Merry was being held. This is where the climactic escape sequence begins as the Straw Hats stage their hostage ruse to board their ship.

keyEvents.title: Marines Bombard Luffy's Group
keyEvents.description: Drake's marines attack Luffy's group at the dock with gunfire and flash bombs.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the final confrontation at the dock.

keyEvents.title: The Hostage Ruse
keyEvents.description: The crew stages a fake hostage situation with Chopper as the 'ferocious madman' holding Nami and Dr. Kobato hostage.
keyEvents.significance: The clever deception that allows the crew to board the Going Merry.

keyEvents.title: Mekao Releases the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Mekao helps the pirates by releasing the Going Merry from the dock into the bay.
keyEvents.significance: Enables the crew's escape from the fortress.

statusHistory.reason: Functional Marine dock within the G-8 fortress

description: The library within the G-8 Marine fortress where Robin conducted research and obtained a map of the base before escaping to rejoin the crew.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Escape from the Library
keyEvents.description: Robin finishes her research, obtains a map of the fortress, subdues Marines, and escapes from the library.
keyEvents.significance: Robin gathers valuable intelligence that aids the crew's escape.

statusHistory.reason: Functional library within the G-8 fortress

description: The massive gate that controls access to and from the G-8 Marine fortress by sea. The gate must be opened or destroyed for ships to enter or exit the fortress.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Redirects Cannon Fire
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Fusen to catch cannonballs and redirect them at the sea gate, destroying it.
keyEvents.significance: Destruction of the gate creates the escape route for the Going Merry.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed by Luffy's redirected cannonballs during the escape

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. In this episode, the crew successfully recovers the Going Merry from G-8 custody and escapes the fortress.

keyEvents.title: The Crew Boards the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew successfully boards the Going Merry after the hostage ruse and prepares to escape.
keyEvents.significance: Reunites the crew with their beloved ship.

keyEvents.title: Robin Rejoins the Crew
keyEvents.description: Robin swings onto the Going Merry from the G-8 base, completing the crew reunion.
keyEvents.significance: All crew members are now together on their ship.

keyEvents.title: Escape from the G-8 Fortress
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry sails through the destroyed sea gate and escapes from G-8.
keyEvents.significance: Successful conclusion of the G-8 arc's main conflict.

statusHistory.reason: Operational ship of the Straw Hat Pirates
